page.title: Driving Lesson Packages
page.subtitle: Choose the perfect package for your driving journey. Flexible options designed to fit your learning needs and schedule.

packages.name: 1 Hour Driving Lesson
packages.description: One lesson, to evaluate and prepare for your road test

packages.name: 1.5 Hours Driving Lessons
packages.description: Perfect for intermediate or experienced drivers wanting a reminder of driving skills

packages.name: Package A
packages.description: In this package you will get four 90 minutes lessons. Total hours 6 behind the wheel.

packages.name: Package B
packages.description: In this package you will get six 90 minutes lessons. Total hours 9 behind the wheel.

packages.name: Package C
packages.description: In this package you will get ten 90 minutes lessons. Total hours 15 behind the wheel.

packages.name: Road Test
packages.description: In this package you will get 60 minutes refresher lesson and a school vehicle for road testing.

footer.title: Need Help Choosing?
footer.text: Our experienced instructors can help you select the perfect package based on your driving experience and goals. Contact us for personalized recommendations.
